wikitext.*:
'''''Nogoth''''' (plural ''Noegyth'') is a [[Sindarin]] word for "Dwarf" as a race.<ref>{{WJ|Quendi}}, p. 388</ref> It is a combination of the adjective ''[[naug]]'' "dwarf" and the augmentative suffix ''-oth'', so literally meaning "Big Dwarf".<ref>{{PE|17}}, p. 45</ref>

==Examples==
* ''[[Nogothrim]]''
* ''[[Noegyth Nibin]]''
